review.title: “A small, but very professionally run company, very passionate about the work they do.”
review.pros: Pros – * Offices in Delhi, Mumbai and USA allow for seamless coverage pan India as well as sourcing business from US companies (esp IT) * Personal involvement of all senior people* A healthy open door, informal workplace atmosphere
review.cons: Cons – Could do with more resources
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – * Expansion to Singapore, Australia and Europe now a must* Expand services to cover marketing advisory
